Posts.Content: yes!! I have been on it since mid-March and I am freezing most of the time. I don't like it, but it's better than the hot sweats. I did not have this before I started taking the tamoxifen, and although it's not listed as a side effect, my dr. said it is likely from that. I always got cold right before I was going to start my period, so I know hormones can do that.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen question?
